<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes,<s%> <S%G1097>perceiving<s%> <S%G190>it,<s%> followed <S%G846>him.<s%> <S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G1209>welcomed<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> and <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2390>cured<s%> those <S%G2192>who<s%> <S%G5532>needed<s%> <S%G2322>healing.<s%>

<S%G1161>The<s%> <S%G756><s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to wear <S%G2827>away;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G4334>came,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G630>"Send<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G630>away,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they may <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the surrounding <S%G2968>villages<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G68>farms,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2647>lodge,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>get<s%> <S%G1979>food,<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G2048>deserted<s%> <S%G5117>place.<s%>"

<S%G1063>For<s%> they <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G5616>about<s%> five <S%G4000>thousand<s%> <S%G435>men.<s%> <S%G1161>He<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G2625>"Make<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> sit <S%G2625>down<s%> <S%G303>in<s%> <S%G2828>groups<s%> of about fifty <S%G4004>each.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> he <S%G2008>warned<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G2008>commanded<s%> them to <S%G2036>tell<s%> this to no <S%G3367>one,<s%>

<S%G3754>saying,<s%> "The <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3958>suffer<s%> many <S%G4183>things,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> be <S%G593>rejected<s%> <S%G575>by<s%> the <S%G4245>elders,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> chief <S%G749>priests,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1122>scribes,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> be <S%G615>killed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2250>the<s%> <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> be raised <S%G1453>up.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> the <S%G230>truth:<s%> There <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> of those who <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G5602>here,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G1089>will<s%> in <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3361>way<s%> <S%G1089>taste<s%> of <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G302>they<s%> <S%G1492>see<s%> the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>"

<S%G1722>When<s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1096>came,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3441>alone.<s%> <S%G846>They<s%> were <S%G4601>silent,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G518>told<s%> no <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3762>any<s%> of the things <S%G3739>which<s%> they had <S%G3708>seen.<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3793>crowd<s%> called <S%G310>out,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> I <S%G1189>beg<s%> <S%G4675>you<s%> to <S%G1914>look<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5207>son,<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3427>my<s%> only <S%G3439>child.<s%>

<S%G5087>"Let<s%> <S%G5210><s%> <S%G5128>these<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> <S%G5087>sink<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3775>ears,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G3195>will<s%> be <S%G3860>delivered<s%> up <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G5495>hands<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> they <S%G50>didn't<s%> understand <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G4487>saying.<s%> <S%G2532>It<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3871>concealed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they should <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G143>perceive<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they were <S%G5399>afraid<s%> to <S%G2065>ask<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G4487>saying.<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3739>"Whoever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> <S%G1209>receives<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> little <S%G3813>child<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1209>receives<s%> <S%G1691>me.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3739>Whoever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> <S%G1209>receives<s%> <S%G1691>me<s%> <S%G1209>receives<s%> him who <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G3165>me.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> whoever <S%G5225>is<s%> <S%G3398>least<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> this <S%G3778>one<s%> will <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3173>great.<s%>"

<S%G1492>When<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G2036>this,<s%> they said, <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> do <S%G2309>you<s%> want us to <S%G2036>command<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%> to come <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3772>sky,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G355>destroy<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>just<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2243>Elijah<s%> <S%G4160>did?<s%>"
